abstract.text: A user request for information about their accounts in your app.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: Siri creates an instance of

when the user asks for information about accounts available in your app. Users can ask for information about monetary and nonmonetary accounts. For example, an airline app might allow the user to search for an account that manages their frequent flier miles. The user can ask for information such as a list of accounts or the balance of a specific account. Use the data the intent provides to find the user’s accounts and return the information the user requests.
To process the request, your handler must adopt the
protocol. When your implementation confirms the request, provide an instance of
that includes the accounts that meet the user’s critieria. If the search is successful, Siri offers the user a way to view the results.
is only available to Siri Intents and requires an unlocked device before processing. Siri performs the following actions automatically:
Requests the user’s confirmation before passing the request to your app or Intents extension for processing.
Asks the user to unlock a locked device.

Users can ask Siri to search for accounts in a variety of ways. Although not exhaustive, the following table provides a few sample phrases, in different languages, that you can use when testing your intents.
Locale
Example 1
Example 2
How much money is in my checking account?
How many points are on my credit card?
我的支票账户里面有多少钱
我的信用卡上面有多少点数
我嘅支票戶口入面有幾多錢
我嘅信用卡入面有幾多積分點數
存款帳戶裡有多少錢
我信用卡上有多少點數
我嘅支票户口入面有几多钱
我嘅信用卡入面有几多积分点数
كم من المال في حسابي بالبنك الوطني
كم نقطة على بطاقة الائتمان الخاصة بي
hvor mange penge er der i min lønkonto
hvor mange points er på mit kreditkort
Wie viel Geld ist auf meinem Girokonto
Wie viele Punkte habe ich mit meiner Kreditkarte gesammelt.
¿Cuánto dinero tengo en mi cuenta corriente?
Dime cuántos puntos tiene mi tarjeta de crédito
Kuinka paljon minulla on rahaa käyttötilillä
Kuinka monta bonuspistettä on luottokortillani
Combien y a-t-il sur mon compte courant
Combien de points y a-t-il sur ma carte de crédit
כמה כסף יש בחשבון החסכון שלי
כמה נקודות יש בכרטיס אשראי שלי
Quanti soldi ci sono nel mio conto bancario
Quanti punti ho sulla mia carta di credito
チェッキング口座にお金はいくらある
クレジットカードのポイントはどれくらい
통장에 돈 얼마나 있어
신용카드에 포인트 얼마나 있어
Berapa banyak wang dalam akaun semasa saya
Berapakah mata pada kad kredit saya
Hvor mye penger er det på brukskontoen min
Hvor mange poeng har jeg på kredittkortet
Hoeveel geld heb ik op mijn betaalrekening
Hoeveel punten staan er op mijn creditcard.
Quanto dinheiro tem na minha conta corrente
Quantos pontos tem no meu cartão de crédito
Сколько денег на моём текущем счету
Сколько бонусных баллов на моей кредитной карточке
Hur mycket pengar finns det på mitt bankkonto
Hur många poäng har jag på mitt kreditkort
ฉันมีเงินอยู่ในบัญชีกระแสรายวันอยู่เท่าไหร่
ฉันมีแต้มบัตรเครดิตเท่าไหร่
Birikim hesabımda ne kadar bakiye var
Kredi kartımda ne kadar puan var

abstract.text: Empower people to customize interactions for your app on their device.
Constants indicating the meaning of a balance.
A request to fulfill in your app or Intents extension.
A user request for information about their accounts in your app.
The nickname that the user assigned to the account.
The type of the account.
Initializes the intent object with the specified search parameters.
The name of an organization attached to the account.
The balance type requested by the user.
The handler interface for searching for account information.
Your app’s response to a request to search for account information.
A protocol that enables an object to be encoded and decoded for archiving and distribution.
A protocol that objects adopt to provide functional copies of themselves.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
A protocol that enables encoding and decoding in a manner that is robust against object substitution attacks.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
A type with a customized textual representation.
A type with a customized textual representation suitable for debugging purposes.
A type whose instances can be encoded, and appropriately passed, as elements of a C `va_list`.
